title: Casio Watch
description: Silver Casio F-91W watch with a clear band. The digital display shows the time as 3:15:27.

title: Green Wallet
description: I have lost a green leather card holder, with a gold carabiner key chain, several keys, and cards inside. The cardholder is embossed with the text "Every Other Thursday".
I have lost a red leather women's wallet with decorative stitching and a flower-shaped metal embellishment. The wallet contains cash and credit cards.

title: Headphones
description: I have lost a pair of white Sony WH-CH720N headphones with stickers of butterflies, clouds, and musical notes on each earcup. The headphones sit atop their original packaging box.
I have lost a purple wallet, which appears to contain cash and credit cards. The wallet is open and lying on the ground.

title: Headphones
description: I have lost a pair of white Sony WH-CH720N noise-canceling headphones with custom stickers on the earcups. The stickers include designs of butterflies, clouds, and musical notes in pastel colors.

I have lost a deep red leather wallet with a decorative silver-colored clasp and white stitching around the edges. The wallet is held in a hand with red nail polish, and another similar wallet filled with cash and credit cards is also visible.

title: tiger
description: I have lost a tiger, characterized by its orange fur with black stripes. The tiger has a tail with black and white rings at the end.
